text: Eschenbach in der Oberpfalz is a town in Neustadt an der Waldnaab, in Bavaria, Germany. It is 25 km west of Neustadt an der Waldnaab, 30 km west of Weiden in der Oberpfalz, and 28 km southeast of Bayreuth. It is also about 1 km north of the large US military base in Grafenw√∂hr. ==References== Category:Neustadt an der Waldnaab (district)
title: Eschenbach in der Oberpfalz
